marklogic.body: city, county, state are NOT RECOGNIZED NOR AUTHORIZED AS GOVENMENT! they have been TOLD THIS; "dc" IS TO BE KNOWN AS THE PLACE OF DECPTION! BEEN UNDER THE RULE OF BRIT: never AMERICANS! ALL MEDIA OUR ENTIRE LIVES HAS BEEN FABRICATED FICTION; designed TO SHAPE OUR MINDS & THINKING PATTERNS! EVEN THOUGH OF COURSE THIS IS ILLEGAL & CRIMINAL; but then, DEMOCRACY MEANT DECEPTION! WORKED BY EXPLOIATATION; targeting & harming EVERYONE within THIS NATION using guess what? a SYSTEM DESIGNED FOR THEM TO HAVE ALL THE $ THEY WANTED; DO ANY ILLEGAL & CRIMINAL ACTIVIES THEY WANTED; with the SYSTEM OF FABRICATED FICTION THEY BEEN USING as "law"; FOR THEIR OWN PERSONAL PROFIT & ! COMPLETE of course with CORRUPT COURTS: denying JUSTICE TO EXIST HERE & EVERYWHERE THEY HAVE GONE WHICH IS OF COURSE, GLOBALLY: lining up the united nations UNDER THEM; including CHINA; which they call DEMOCRATIC DICATATORSHIP THERE & MOST OTHER NATIONS excepting THIS one of course; would NEVER DO TO NOT BE ABLE TO SEND PEOPLE TO WAR TO END DICTATORSHIPS thru MANIPULATION OF THE MEDIA now WOULD IT? EXPLOITATION of course is guess what? A CRIME! SO SHRED SHRED SHRED FROM YOUR THINKING EVERYTHING YOU EVER THOUGHT: BEEN TAUGHT: cuz THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN ANY TRUTH WHATSOEVER TO ANY OF IT! WE THE PEOPLE DO NOT ACCEPT ANY OF THEIR SO CALLED LAWS; ANY RULINGS FROM ANY COURTS WHATSEOVER THEY HAVE SET UP; WE WALK LAWFULLY & THEY DO NOT! LET ME TELL Y"ALL SOMETHING: these CORPORATIONS of theres; employees IN THEM;will try & make up a "law" ON THE SPOT: and WATCH to SEE if YOU ACCEPT it as "LAW" OR NOT! WHEN YOU STATE: do you REALLY WANT TO GET INTO A DISCUSSION WITH ME ABOUT WHAT IS LEGAL AND WHAT IS NOT WITH THE WAY YOU ALL HAVE BEEN RUNNING THIS NATION? TRUST ME; THEY SHUT UP! HATS OFF TO ALL PATRIOTS EVERYWHERE!
